member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter.DownSample(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Uses pixels units for width/height
member.returns: The TaskParameter instance for chaining the call.
member.param: Optional width parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this width while keeping aspect ratio.
Optional height parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this height while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter.DownSampleInDip(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reduce memory usage by downsampling the image. Aspect ratio will be kept even if width/height values are incorrect. Uses device independent points units for width/height
member.returns: The TaskParameter instance for chaining the call.
member.param: Optional width parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this width while keeping aspect ratio.
Optional height parameter, if value is higher than zero it will try to downsample to this height while keeping aspect ratio.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Work.TaskParameter.DownSampleMode(FFImageLoading.Work.InterpolationMode)
member.summary: Set mode for downsampling. Speed-wise: nearest neighbour > linear > cubic.\ Default: bilinear On Android it's always ignored as Android uses bitmap insamplesize downsampling (bilinear)
member.returns: The TaskParameter instance for chaining the call.
member.param: Optional mode parameter, if not set, defaults to linear.

member.summary: Gets or sets the http client used for web requests.
member.value: The http client used for web requests.

member.summary: Gets or sets the scheduler used to organize/schedule image loading tasks.
member.value: The scheduler used to organize/schedule image loading tasks.

member.summary: Gets or sets the logger used to receive debug/error messages.

member.summary: Gets or sets the disk cache.
member.value: The disk cache.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.DownloadCache
member.summary: Gets or sets the download cache. Download cache is responsible for retrieving data from the web, or taking from the disk cache.
member.value: The download cache.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.LoadWithTransparencyChannel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this loads images with transparency channel. On Android we save 50% of the memory without transparency since we use 2 bytes per pixel instead of 4.
member.value: true if FFIMageLoading loads images with transparency; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.FadeAnimationEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this fade animation enabled.
member.value: true if fade animation enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.FadeAnimationForCachedImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating wheter fade animation for cached or local images should be enabled.
member.value: true if fade animation for cached or local images; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.FadeAnimationDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the default duration of the fade animation in ms.
member.value: The duration of the fade animation.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.TransformPlaceholders
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this transforming place is enabled.
member.value: true if transform should be applied to placeholder images; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.DownsampleInterpolationMode
member.summary: Gets or sets default downsample interpolation mode.
member.value: downsample interpolation mode

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.HttpHeadersTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum time in seconds to wait to receive HTTP headers before the HTTP request is cancelled.
member.value: The http connect timeout.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.HttpReadTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum time in seconds to wait before the HTTP request is cancelled.
member.value: The http read timeout.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.MaxMemoryCacheSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the memory cache in bytes.
member.value: The maximum size of the memory cache in bytes.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Config.Configuration.DelayInMs
member.summary: Milliseconds to wait prior to start any task.

member.summary: Enables / disables verbose memory cache logging.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Concurrency.ConcurrentDictionary`2.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the .
member.returns: An enumerator for the .
member.remarks: The enumerator returned from the dictionary is safe to use concurrently with reads and writes to the dictionary, however it does not represent a moment-in-time snapshot of the dictionary. The contents exposed through the enumerator may contain modifications made to the dictionary after was called.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Concurrency.ConcurrentDictionary`2.GrowTable(FFImageLoading.Concurrency.ConcurrentDictionary{`0,`1}.Tables)
member.summary: Replaces the bucket table with a larger one. To prevent multiple threads from resizing the table as a result of races, the Tables instance that holds the table of buckets deemed too small is passed in as an argument to GrowTable(). GrowTable() obtains a lock, and then checks the Tables instance has been replaced in the meantime or not.

member.name: P:FFImageLoading.Concurrency.ConcurrentDictionary`2.DefaultConcurrencyLevel
member.summary: The number of concurrent writes for which to optimize by default.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Concurrency.ConcurrentDictionary`2.AcquireAllLocks(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Acquires all locks for this hash table, and increments locksAcquired by the number of locks that were successfully acquired. The locks are acquired in an increasing order.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Concurrency.ConcurrentDictionary`2.AcquireLocks(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Acquires a contiguous range of locks for this hash table, and increments locksAcquired by the number of locks that were successfully acquired. The locks are acquired in an increasing order.

member.name: M:FFImageLoading.Concurrency.ConcurrentDictionary`2.ReleaseLocks(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Releases a contiguous range of locks.
